Reviews.Title: Best in market.
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Faster than iPhone and Samsung S4. Much more beautiful. No need to conect to iTunes everytime I want to save or exchange songs / photos. Amazing phone. Buy it now!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
LG Optimus S G2 F320S LTE-A 32GB White Snapdragon 800 Unlocked Smartphone Phone
CPU & GPU: Qualcomm MSM8974 Snapdragon 800 Quad-core 2.26 GHz Krait 400, Adreno 330
Memory: RAM 2GB , ROM 32GB
Screen: 5.2 inches(~424 ppi ) 1080 x 1920 pixels, 13 MP/ Auto Focus , LED flash
Network: WCDMA /GSM ,Android OS, v4.2.2 (Jelly Bean), battery 2610 mAh
ProductInfo.Name: LG Optimus S G2 F320S LTE-A 32GB White Snapdragon 800 Unlocked Smartphone Phone
